name: AP_CLAIM_IF_INFO_5
description: Overflow table for claim data that can be sent or received by prospective payment systems (PPS) Pricers.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: MUE_IMPACT
columns.description: Impact of MUE edits on grouping results

columns.name: MUE_OPTIONS
columns.description: Types of MUE editing to be applied during processing

columns.name: NCCI_IMPACT
columns.description: Impact of NCCI edits on grouping results

columns.name: NCCI_OPTIONS
columns.description: Types of NCCI editing to be applied during processing

columns.name: BILLING_NOTE
columns.description: Remarks needed for adjudicating a claim

columns.name: MDC
columns.description: Major Diagnostic Category

columns.name: UNDETER_POA_INTERP
columns.description: Indicates the behavior for handling an undetermined POA indicator

columns.name: SCHED_SUBTYPE
columns.description: Subtype of the schedule to be used for processing

columns.name: ADD_ON_PAYMENT
columns.description: Amount to reimburse for things such as capital costs

columns.name: ADJ_WEIGHT
columns.description: Final APR DRG related factor used to calculate the standard payment. Includes any increases due to patient age or facility factors.

columns.name: ADJ_USED_TEXT
columns.description: Description associated with the adjuster used to process the claim

columns.name: AUTO_TRANS_PMT
columns.description: Hospital specific additional claim payment amount for Inter-Governmental Transfers.

columns.name: CHG_CAP_ADJ
columns.description: Amount the total payment is reduced when the total payment exceeds the covered charges.

columns.name: CHG_CAP_CUT
columns.description: Difference between the original payment and the charges, when the charge cap is applied.

columns.name: CHG_REDUCT_FACTOR
columns.description: Ratio of the total charges to the initial total payment.

columns.name: CLM_ADJ
columns.description: Claim adjustment percent used in the claim reimbursement

columns.name: CLM_TYP
columns.description: Type of claim being processed

columns.name: COST_OUTLIER
columns.description: Portion of the high cost outlier payment for the claim that is the reimbursement for the claim costs above the claim high cost threshold and below the agency second cost threshold.

columns.name: COST_OUTLIER_2
columns.description: Portion of the high cost outlier payment for the claim that is the reimbursement for the claim costs above the agency second cost threshold.

columns.name: COST_CHG_RATIO
columns.description: Ratio of costs to charges as defined in the SSM schedule that was used for processing.

columns.name: COVERED_LOS
columns.description: The number of days in a claim length of stay that are recognized for payment.

columns.name: EMERG_REDUCT_FLAG
columns.description: Indicates that the claim is a preventable ER encounter based on the diagnosis codes.

columns.name: FINAL_SEVERITY
columns.description: Final severity

columns.name: FINAL_SEVERITY_DESC
columns.description: Description of final severity

columns.name: HIGH_LOS_PMT
columns.description: Portion of the total payment for the claim that includes reimbursement for care where the LOS is greater than the agency defined high LOS threshold.

columns.name: HIGH_LOS_THRESHOLD
columns.description: Length of stay that if the claim LOS is greater, makes the claim eligible for a High LOS outlier payment.

columns.name: ICU_INTENSITY
columns.description: Identifies patients with diagnoses or procedures that are generally associated with the need for treatment in an Intensive Care Unit

columns.name: INITIAL_SEV
columns.description: Initial Severity

columns.name: INITIAL_SEV_DESC
columns.description: Description for initial severity

columns.name: INT_GV_TRNSFR_ADJ
columns.description: Claim adjustment percent used in the claim intergovernmental transfer reimbursement

columns.name: LOW_COST_OUT_REDUCT
columns.description: Portion of the claim total payment due to the claim qualifying as a low cost outlier

columns.name: PPC_REDUCT_AMT
columns.description: Portion of the total payment that is subtracted from the claim as a result of the PPC ratio adjustment

columns.name: PPR_REDUCT_AMT
columns.description: Percent reduction to the claim total payment due to the hospital PPR ratio

columns.name: PREV_MED_DX_FLAG
columns.description: Identifies the presence of a diagnosis code indicative of a preventive or screening diagnosis

columns.name: SCHED_DATA_IND
columns.description: Indicates how the schedule data, that was provided in the request with the claim data, was used during processing.

columns.name: SDA_APPLIED
columns.description: The Standard Dollar Amount utilized to calculate claim payment.

columns.name: SELF_FUND_TRANS_PMT
columns.description: Hospital specific additional claim payment amount for Inter-Governmental Transfers.

columns.name: SVC_ADJ_NICU
columns.description: Percent the relative weight is incremented due to the facility having an agency designated neonatal intensive care unit

columns.name: SVC_ADJ_OBESTERICS
columns.description: Percent the relative weight is incremented due to obstetrical service.

columns.name: THRD_PRTY_LIAB_PMT
columns.description: Amount paid by another payer to be subtracted from the claim payment before final adjustments are made.

columns.name: TRNS_PMT
columns.description: Portion of the claim total payment due to the claim qualifying as a transfer.

columns.name: TRAUMA_SUPP_PMT
columns.description: Portion of the claim total payment associated with the supplemental payment for specific hospitals

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_CODE
columns.description: Chief or primary complaint of the patient at admission.

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_CODE_DESC
columns.description: Description for Admit Diagnosis Code

columns.name: CODE_VERSION_MAPPING_BASED_ON
columns.description: The date that drives the Automatically Determine Code Mapping field.

columns.name: TOTAL_PAYMENT_WITHOUT_ACCESS
columns.description: The total payment of the claim without the access payment.

columns.name: SURGICAL_MORTALITY_INDICATOR
columns.description: Indicator that drives mortality measures by identifying cases beyond the provider's control.
